name: claude-plugins
description: Language-agnostic workflow plugins for Claude Code — multi-model AI collaboration, rebase automation, changelog generation, and TDD workflows

plugins.name: multi-model
plugins.description: Run prompts across Claude, Gemini, and GPT in parallel — plan, execute, review, and synthesize the best of all models

plugins.name: rebase
plugins.description: Automated rebase onto trunk with conflict prediction, resolution, and quality gate verification

plugins.name: changelog
plugins.description: Generate categorized changelog entries from branch commits and PR context

plugins.name: tdd
plugins.description: TDD bug-fix workflow — reproduce bugs as failing tests, find root cause, fix, and verify
